about.bio: I am a results-driven Full-Stack Developer with a passion for creating clean, efficient, and user-centric web applications. My journey into tech began with a deep curiosity for how things work, which quickly evolved into a career focused on building robust digital solutions. I honed my skills in modern technologies like React, Node.js, and Python during my intensive training with the Digital Egypt Pioneers Initiative (DEPI). I thrive in environments that challenge me to learn and adapt, and I am dedicated to writing high-quality code that solves real-world problems and delivers measurable value.

services.title: Web Development
services.description: Building modern, responsive, and user-friendly websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.

services.title: Full Stack Solutions
services.description: Developing complete applications with front-end, back-end, and database integration.

services.title: API Development & Integration
services.description: Creating and connecting RESTful APIs for seamless data exchange.

services.title: Database Management
services.description: Designing and optimizing SQL databases for scalable applications.

services.title: Freelance Projects
services.description: Delivering tailored solutions for clients with a focus on quality and deadlines.

description: Completed an intensive training program focused on modern Full-Stack development.
Gained hands-on experience with React, Node.js, C#, HTML, SQL, JavaScript, CSS.
Developed and deployed end-to-end web applications in a simulated real-world environment.
Collaborated in an Agile team, practicing version control with Git and GitHub.

projects.name: Business Data Visualization Dashboard
projects.description: A responsive web application that visualizes complex business data, helping users track Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) and gain actionable insights through interactive charts and graphs.
features: Advanced filtering by date and category.

projects.name: TeamFlow - Task Management Platform
projects.description: A collaborative platform designed to help teams organize, track, and manage their projects and tasks efficiently. Inspired by tools like Trello and Asana.
features: Create projects, task boards, and to-do lists.
Assign tasks to team members and set deadlines.

projects.name: E-Commerce Storefront
projects.description: A clean and modern frontend for an e-commerce store, focusing on providing a seamless and enjoyable shopping experience for customers.
features: Product listing with search and filtering capabilities.
Responsive design for mobile and desktop.
